history.taskDescription: Your task is to measure the melting point of chocolate, which is located around the kitchen. First, focus on the thermometer. Next, focus on the chocolate. If the melting point of chocolate is above -10.0 degrees celsius, focus on the blue box. If the melting point of chocolate is below -10.0 degrees celsius, focus on the orange box. The boxes are located around the kitchen.
